name: collision_func
description: This function will be called when the <%= doc_class_name %> collides with another <%= type 'Entity' %>.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.desc: The <%= doc_class_name %> that will be executing the <%= type 'CardAction' %>.

parameters.name: other
parameters.desc: The <%= type 'Entity' %> that collided with this <%= doc_class_name %>.
